247.description: Set the bot to stay in the voice channel

errors.not_in_voice: You need to be in a voice channel to use this command.
errors.generic: An error occurred while trying to execute this command.

fairplay.description: Set the bot to play music fairly among users.

errors.not_in_voice: You need to be in a voice channel to use this command.
errors.generic: An error occurred while trying to execute this command.

lavalink.description: Shows the current Lavalink node statistics.
lavalink.title: Lavalink Stats

invite.content: You can invite me by clicking the button below. Any bugs or outages? Join the support server!

options.command: The command you want to get info on

help.content:
Hey there! I'm `{bot}`, a music bot made with [`Lavamusic`](https://github.com/bongodevs/lavamusic) and `Discord.js`.
You can use `{prefix}help <command>` to get more info on a command.
help.title: Help Menu
help.footer: Use {prefix}help <command> for more info on a command

fields.creator: Creator
fields.description: He really wanted to make his first open source project ever for more coding experience. In this project, he was challenged to make a project with fewer bugs. Hope you enjoy using LavaMusic!

dj.description: Manage the DJ mode and associated roles

messages.role_exists: The DJ role <@&{roleId}> is already added.
messages.role_added: The DJ role <@&{roleId}> has been added.
messages.role_not_found: The DJ role <@&{roleId}> is not added.
messages.role_removed: The DJ role <@&{roleId}> has been removed.
messages.all_roles_cleared: All DJ roles have been removed.
messages.toggle: The DJ mode has been toggled to {status}.

options.add: The DJ role you want to add
options.remove: The DJ role you want to remove

language.invalid_language:
Please provide a valid language. Example: `en-US` for English (United States)

You can find the list of supported languages [here](https://discord.com/developers/docs/reference#locales)

**Available Languages:**
{languages}
language.already_set: The language is already set to `{language}`
language.set: The language has been set to `{language}`
language.reset: The language has been reset to the default language.

options.set: Set the language for the bot
options.language: The language you want to set
options.reset: Change the language back to the default language

prefix.description: Shows or sets the bot's prefix

errors.prefix_too_long: The prefix cannot be longer than 3 characters.

messages.current_prefix: The prefix for this server is `{prefix}`
messages.prefix_set: The prefix for this server is now `{prefix}`
messages.prefix_reset: The prefix for this server is now `{prefix}`

options.prefix: The prefix you want to set
options.reset: Resets the prefix to the default one

errors.channel_exists: The song request channel already exists.
errors.channel_not_exists: The song request channel doesn't exist.
errors.channel_delete_fail: The setup channel has been deleted from the database. Please delete the text channel manually.

messages.channel_created: The song request channel has been created in <#{channelId}>.
messages.channel_deleted: The song request channel has been deleted.

defaultvolume.description: Sets the default volume for the bot in this server

options.volume: The default volume you want to set (0-200)

messages.current: The current default volume for this server is **{volume}**.
messages.set: `‚úÖ` | The default volume has been set to **{volume}**.
messages.too_low: The volume can't be lower than 0.
messages.too_high: The volume can't be higher than 200.

options.level: The bassboost level you want to set

messages.invalid_level: Please provide a valid bassboost level. Available levels: `high`, `medium`, `low`, `off`.

options.pitch: The value to set the pitch to (0.5 - 5)

errors.invalid_number: Please provide a valid number between 0.5 and 5.

rate.description: Change the rate of the song

options.rate: The value to set the rate to (0.5 - 5)

errors.invalid_number: Please provide a valid number between 0.5 and 5.

speed.description: Change the speed of the song

options.speed: The speed you want to set (0.5 - 5)

messages.invalid_number: Please provide a valid number between 0.5 and 5.

grab.description: Save the current song to your DM.
grab.dm_failed: I couldn't send you a DM. Please make sure your DMs are open.

join.description: Joins the bot to your voice channel
join.no_voice_channel: You need to be in a voice channel to use this command.

leave.description: Disconnect the bot from the voice channel
leave.not_in_channel: I'm not in a voice channel.

loop.description: Loop the current song or the queue

options.mode: The loop mode you want to set

lyrics.description: Display lyrics for the current track
lyrics.no_lyrics_on_page: No lyrics found on this page.
lyrics.session_expired: The session has expired. Use the command again to refresh.
lyrics.subscribed: You have subscribed to live lyrics updates!
lyrics.unsubscribed: You have unsubscribed from live lyrics updates.

errors.no_results: No lyrics found for the current track.
errors.lyrics_error: An error occurred while getting the lyrics.
errors.no_player_for_lyrics: Cannot get lyrics for this song without an active player.

options.song: The song you want to get lyrics for

play.description: Plays a song from YouTube, Spotify, URL, etc.

options.song: The song or URL you want to play

errors.search_error: There was an error while searching.
errors.queue_too_long: The queue is too long. The maximum length is {maxQueueSize} songs.
errors.playlist_too_long: The playlist is too long. The maximum length is {maxPlaylistSize} songs.

options.file: The audio file you want to play

errors.empty_query: Please attach an audio file to play.
errors.invalid_format: You can only play MP3, WAV, OGG, FLAC, AAC or M4A files.
errors.no_results: Failed to play the audio file. It may be corrupted.

playnext.description: Adds a song to the top of the queue

options.song: The song you want to play

errors.search_error: There was an error while searching.
errors.queue_too_long: The queue is too long. The maximum length is {maxQueueSize} songs.
errors.playlist_too_long: The playlist is too long. The maximum length is {maxPlaylistSize} songs.

playnext.added_to_play_next: Added [{title}]({uri}) to play next in the queue.
playnext.added_playlist_to_play_next: Added {length} songs to play next in the queue.

remove.description: Removes a specific song from the queue

options.song: The song number you want to remove

errors.no_songs: There are no songs in the queue.
errors.invalid_number: Please provide a valid song number.

messages.removed: Removed song number {songNumber} from the queue.

errors.not_seekable: Cannot replay this track as it is not seekable.

options.song: The song you are looking for

search.select: Select a song from the list...

errors.no_results_description: I couldn't find any songs matching your query. Try changing keywords or providing a link.
errors.invalid_selection_description: The selected option is invalid. Please select a song number from the list.
errors.search_error: An error occurred while searching for the song.
errors.vc_connect_fail_description: I could not connect to your voice channel. Make sure I have the proper permissions.

messages.select_prompt: Select a number to add the song to the queue.
messages.selection_timed_out_description: No song was selected within the given time. The search has been canceled. Please try again.

seek.description: Seeks to a specific time in the song

errors.invalid_format: Invalid time format. Examples: seek 1m, seek 1h 30m
errors.beyond_duration: Cannot seek beyond the song duration of {length}.

errors.fairplay: Fairplay mode is enabled. You cannot shuffle the queue.

skipto.description: Skips to a specific song in the queue

options.number: The number of the song you want to skip to

move.description: Move a track position in the queue

options.from: The position of the track to move
options.to: The position to move the track to

errors.no_tracks: There are no tracks in the queue.
errors.invalid_usage: Invalid usage. Please provide from and to positions.
errors.invalid_positions: Please provide valid track positions within the queue.
errors.same_position: The from and to positions are the same.

stop.description: Stops the music and clears the queue

messages.stopped: Stopped the music and cleared the queue.

options.number: The volume you want to set (0-200)

messages.too_low: The volume can't be lower than 0.
messages.too_high: The volume can't be higher than 200. Do you want to damage your hearing or speakers? Hmmm, I don't think that's such a good idea.

addsong.description: Adds a song to a saved playlist

options.playlist: The playlist you want to add to
options.song: The song you want to add

messages.name_too_long: Playlist names can only be 50 characters long.
messages.playlist_exists: A playlist with that name already exists. Please use a different name.
messages.name_empty: You must provide a playlist name.

options.playlist: The playlist you want to delete

list.description: Lists all playlists for a user

options.user: The user whose playlists you want to retrieve

messages.error: An error occurred while retrieving the playlists.
messages.invalid_username: Invalid username or user not found.

load.description: Loads a saved playlist into the queue.

options.playlist: The playlist you want to load

messages.no_lavalink_nodes: There are no available Lavalink nodes to load the playlist.

removesong.description: Removes a song from a playlist

options.playlist: The playlist you want to remove from
options.song: The song you want to remove

messages.error_occurred: An error occurred while removing the song.

steal.description: Steals a playlist from another user and adds it to your playlists

options.playlist: The playlist you want to steal
options.user: The user from whom you want to steal the playlist

messages.playlist_not_exist: That playlist doesn't exist for the mentioned user.
messages.playlist_exists: You already have a playlist named `{playlist}`.
messages.error_occurred: An error occurred while stealing the playlist.

movenode.description: Move players to a different Lavalink node

options.node: The node ID to move the players

messages.no_player: There is no active music player in this server.
messages.no_available_nodes: There are no available nodes to move to.
messages.success_description: Player has been moved from `{from}` to `{to}`.
messages.no_players_moved: No players needed to be moved.
messages.no_players: There are no players to move.
